result.eng: You will be allowed to do the exam again.
result.ga: Beidh cead agat an scrúdú a dhéanamh an athuair
result.orig: Beidh cead agat an scrúdú a dhéanamh an athuair
result.html: Beidh cead agat an scrúdú a dhéanamh an athuairYou will be allowed to do the exam again.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ cead agat an scrúdú a ḋéanaṁ an aṫuairYou will be allowed to do the exam again.

result.eng: I was studying hard before the exams.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag staidéar go dian roimh na scrúduithe
result.orig: Bhí mé ag staidéar go dian roimh na scrúduithe
result.html: Bhí mé ag staidéar go dian roimh na scrúduitheI was studying hard before the exams.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag staidéar go dian roiṁ na scrúduiṫeI was studying hard before the exams.

result.eng: You must get ready for the exam.
result.ga: Caithfidh tú tú féin a réiteach don scrúdú
result.orig: Caithfidh tú tú féin a réiteach don scrúdú
result.html: Caithfidh tú tú féin a réiteach don scrúdúYou must get ready for the exam.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ tú tú féin a réiteaċ don scrúdúYou must get ready for the exam.

result.eng: The exam lasted an hour and a half.
result.ga: Mhair an scrúdú uair go leith
result.orig: Mhair an scrúdú uair go leith
result.html: Mhair an scrúdú uair go leithThe exam lasted an hour and a half.
result.ponchtml: Ṁair an scrúdú uair go leiṫThe exam lasted an hour and a half.

result.eng: I didn't succeed in the exam.
result.html: Níor éirigh liom sa scrúdúI didn't succeed in the exam.
result.ponchtml: Níor éiriġ liom sa scrúdúI didn't succeed in the exam.

result.eng: You made a mistake in the exam.
result.html: Rinne tú botún sa scrúdúYou made a mistake in the exam.
result.ponchtml: Rinne tú botún sa scrúdúYou made a mistake in the exam.

result.html: Theip orm sa scrúdúI failed the exam.
result.ponchtml: Ṫeip orm sa scrúdúI failed the exam.

result.eng: I am preparing for the exam.
result.ga: Tá mé ag ullmhú faoi choinne an scrúdaithe
result.orig: Tá mé ag ullmhú faoi choinne an scrúdaithe
result.html: Tá mé ag ullmhú faoi choinne an scrúdaitheI am preparing for the exam.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag ullṁú faoi ċoinne an scrúdaiṫeI am preparing for the exam.

result.eng: On my way back from Ireland last month, I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints.
result.ga: Ar mo bhealach ar ais as Éirinn an mhí seo caite rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga
result.orig: Ar mo bhealach ar ais as Éirinn an mhí seo caite rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga
result.html: Ar mo bhealach ar ais as Éirinn an mhí seo caite rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorgaOn my way back from Ireland last month, I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints.
result.ponchtml: Ar mo ḃealaċ ar ais as Éirinn an ṁí seo caite rinneaḋ scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo ṁéarlorgaOn my way back from Ireland last month, I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints.

result.eng: I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints, like every non-American citizen on his way into the country.
result.ga: Rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga mar a dhéantar le gach éinne nach saoránach Meiriceánach é ar a bhealach isteach sa tír
result.orig: Rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga mar a dhéantar le gach éinne nach saoránach Meiriceánach é ar a bhealach isteach sa tír
result.html: Rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga mar a dhéantar le gach éinne nach saoránach Meiriceánach é ar a bhealach isteach sa tírI had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints, like every non-American citizen on his way into the country.
result.ponchtml: Rinneaḋ scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo ṁéarlorga mar a ḋéantar le gaċ éinne naċ saoránaċ Meiriceánaċ é ar a ḃealaċ isteaċ sa tírI had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints, like every non-American citizen on his way into the country.
